name: The Potions Predicament
description:
The Potions Predicament was made by: Wildgamez and Jasmine Darman (little_fifth), with help from Dillon Wiltshire.

It is a short game where you play as a potion seller. It is your job to make and sell potions to your customers to remedy their problems. Every spell you make will result in a different outcome for every customer, it is your job to determine the right combination of ingredients to satisfy everyone.

Your grandfather crafted an amazing wish-granting potion that everyone wants, but you only have one, and he passed away before he could show you how to make it. Perhaps by honing and advancing your skills as a potion master, you too will be able to craft the ultimate potion and bring peace to the land.
